page.title: 14SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY,K.UNDERWOOD
page.content: My name is Hedvig, I am 6 and live in Kirkby Underwood with my parents and two brothers. We have two Jack Russel terrier dogs and a cat named Tina. On schooldays I get up at 7.30, have breakfast and at 8.35 walk to the bottom of our road to catch the taxi for school; the taxi is driven by Mrs. Redding, the school secretary. At school Mrs.Lack,our teacher teaches us story, picture and maths. before play. After play we have English and sometimes computer, or play in the sand or dress-up using a cot and some dolls. At lunch-time we play skipping games before and after eating our food. In the corner of the classroom is a reading corner with lots of books. I like reading books. Just before we go home Mrs.Lack reads a story.When I get home I play with my brothers before going to bed at 7.30.
